member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Static class providing various extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Returns hexadecimal hash code using MD5 message-digest algorithm

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the substring between two given substrings.
member.param: The subsrting to be searched from
The subsrting to be searched to
member.returns: Returns the searched substring if is found. Otherwise returns empty

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces every cyrillic letter in the input with the corresponding latin letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces every latin letter in the input with the corresponding cyrillic letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input to valid "user name" . Replaces every cyrillic letter with the corresponding latin letter and delete every not acceptable symbol.
member.note: Every symbol different than latin letters, digits, "_", "\", "." are not acceptable and will be deleted.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input to valid "user name" . Replaces every cyrillic letter with the corresponding latin letter, every space with "-" and delete every not acceptable symbol.
member.note: Every symbol different than latin letters, digits, "_", "\", ".", "-" are not acceptable and will be deleted.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a specified number of characters from the input , starting with the first character. If the string is less or equal to the given number, returns the whole .

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file extension from a complete path as
member.param: The input , which may include a full path, of the file for which you want only the extension.
member.returns: File extension . Empty if extension is not found.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the content type corresponding with the input file extension.
